title: thin blue line night mode
content:
i see a thin blue line on my 2 months old well-handled pixel 4a 5g phone while the night mode is on. the line is not visible when i turn off the dark mode. while looking on the internet, i found another user on reddit having the same issue.

https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/79a8ck/thin_blue_line_night_mode/?utm_medium=android_app&utm_source=share

what to do😅🙏
